faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

items.question: What is Banana Generator?
items.answer: A free AI photo editor and image generator powered by the Nano Banana model.

items.question: Do I need to sign up or pay?
items.answer: No. It‚Äôs fast, free, and unlimited to get started.

items.question: What formats are supported?
items.answer: Upload common formats like PNG and JPG; high-res export is supported.

items.question: Is my data private and secure?
items.answer: We follow a privacy-first policy. You keep ownership of your images.

faq.supportingCopy: Need more details? <contactLink>Talk with our AI support team</contactLink> or learn about our mission on the <aboutLink>Banana Generator about page</aboutLink>.

about.title: About Banana Generator
about.intro: Banana Generator is a production-ready AI editing toolkit built for teams that need reliable, repeatable creative results.

sections.title: Our mission
sections.description: Give creators and product teams an intuitive workspace for editing images with natural language prompts‚Äîwithout sacrificing quality or control.

sections.title: What we offer
sections.description: From batch automation to character consistency, Banana Generator combines AI models, storage, and deployment workflows that scale with your needs.

sections.title: Why it matters
sections.description: Teams launch visuals faster, keep branding consistent, and collaborate securely across global markets.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.intro: We‚Äôd love to hear from you. Choose the right channel so our team can respond quickly.

sections.title: How we can help
sections.description: Ask about onboarding, enterprise pilots, billing questions, or new collaboration ideas‚Äîwe respond within one business day.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.intro: Your trust matters. We follow a privacy-by-design approach for every feature we ship.

sections.title: Data we collect
sections.description: We store essential account details, usage events, and files you upload so the product works reliably.

sections.title: How we use data
sections.description: Information is used to deliver core functionality, improve model performance in aggregate, and provide support.

sections.title: Your choices
sections.description: Export your data anytime, request deletion, and control marketing preferences from the dashboard.

terms.title: Terms of service
terms.intro: These terms govern how you access and use Banana Generator.

sections.title: Using Banana Generator
sections.description: You must be 18 or older, keep your credentials secure, and comply with applicable laws.

sections.title: Fair use & content guidelines
sections.description: Do not generate harmful, infringing, or deceptive content. We may suspend accounts that violate policies.

sections.title: Billing & cancellations
sections.description: Subscriptions renew automatically until cancelled. Cancel anytime to avoid future charges.
